title: Calories in 3 Egg Whites
meta_description: Discover calories in 3 egg whites, including protein, low-fat profile, full nutrition breakdown, and simple tweaks for recipes.
assumptions: From large eggs (~33 g per white), raw or lightly cooked without added fat, salt, or oil.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by egg size, freshness, and preparation method; liquid egg whites may differ slightly. Check labels when available.

quick_answer.text: 3 egg whites provide ~51 kcal and ~11 g protein with negligible fat.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts fields for easy comparison.

tweaks.label: Fried in 1 tsp oil per white
Add 1 tbsp low-fat cheese per white

faqs.q: How many calories in one egg white?
faqs.a: About 17 kcal per large egg white.
Yes, ~3.6 g protein per large egg white, making 3 whites ~11 g total.
Yes, 0 mg cholesterol in egg whites since it's all in the yolk.

faqs.q: How do egg whites compare to whole eggs?
faqs.a: Egg whites are lower in calories and fat; 3 whites â‰ˆ51 kcal vs. 234 kcal for 3 whole eggs.

faqs.q: Can I use liquid egg whites instead?
faqs.a: Yes, equivalent to ~3 large whites is 90-100 ml, with similar nutrition.
